snippet: The private equity industry's use of carried interest to lower tax bills, though legal, has drawn criticism. But another lesser-known method might not withstand an I.R.S. challenge, writes Floyd Norris in The New York Times.
abstract: The private equity industry's use of carried interest to lower tax bills, though legal, has drawn criticism. But another lesser-known method might not withstand an I.R.S. challenge, writes Floyd Norris in The New York Times.

headline.main: A Tax Tactic That's Open to Question
